hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Refresh the per-project session index opportunistically (debounced).
# This gives OpenClaw-like 'freshness' without relying on the model remembering.
python3 "$PWD/skills/rlm-retrieval/scripts/hook_index_refresh.py" 2>/dev/null || true
cat

PostToolUse.description: Debounced index refresh after tool usage

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Best-effort: dump transcript + refresh index on session stop.
# (No failure should block Claude Code from stopping.)
if [ -f "$PWD/skills/rlm-retrieval/scripts/dump_transcript.py" ]; then
  python3 "$PWD/skills/rlm-retrieval/scripts/dump_transcript.py" 2>/dev/null || true
fi
if [ -f "$PWD/skills/rlm-retrieval/scripts/index-sessions.py" ]; then
  python3 "$PWD/skills/rlm-retrieval/scripts/index-sessions.py" 2>/dev/null || true
fi
cat

Stop.description: On stop: transcript dump + index refresh
